Literature.Title: Improving the antibacterial activity and selectivity of an ultra short peptide by hydrophobic and hydrophilic amino acid stretches.
Literature.Author: Anunthawan T, Yaraksa N, Phosri S, Theansungnoen T, Daduang S, Dhiravisit A, Thammasirirak S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=23µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MBC=23µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi DMST 22842(MIC=23µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi DMST 22842(MBC=23µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=11µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>91µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Vibrio cholerae non-O1(no activity data),Vibrio cholerae non-O139(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=11µg/ml)
